subtitle: This popular selection of fresh fried seafood makes a good meal or perfect starter if you halve the portions.

method.text: Sift the flour into a bowl and season liberally. Toss all the seafood in the flour until lightly coated.
Place enough oil for deep frying in a large saucepan. Heat to 180?C / 350?F. Add all the coated fish and fry for 2-3 min or until crisp and golden.
Remove with a slotted spoon and drain thoroughly on kitchen paper. Keep warm while repeating with the remainder.

title: Fritto misto di mare
